All digital
Every case starts with a digital 3D model of teeth. Direct scans are best but alginate impressions can be scanned by our lab as well.
Learn more >
X
Process overview
One.
Scan / impression >
3D Scan (preferred) or physical impression. Alginate or PVS impressions can be submitted for scannine.
Two.
Setup >
Computer simulated outcome (aka setup) is created to position brackets accurately. Brackets are positioned for straight wire mechanics.
Three.
3D print >
3D printed indirect bonding tray(s). Brackets are pre-loaded. Just apply adhesive and deliver.
Introducing
Pre-installed wire
Coming soon
It's a first in the world of orthodontics. Braces and wire delivered together inside an indirect bonding tray.
Learn more >
